addon:addon.name: Android Debug Bridge Binding
addon:addon.description: This is the binding for connect to Android devices using the Android Debug Bridge protocol.

parameter.name: discoveryPort
parameter.label: Discovery Port
parameter.description: Port used on discovery to connect to the device through adb.

parameter.name: discoveryReachableMs
parameter.label: Discovery Reachable
parameter.description: Milliseconds to wait while discovering to determine if the ip is reachable.

parameter.name: discoveryIpRangeMin
parameter.label: Discovery Range IP Min
parameter.description: Used to limit the numbers of ips checked while discovering.

parameter.name: discoveryIpRangeMax
parameter.label: Discovery Range IP Max
parameter.description: Used to limit the numbers of ips checked while discovering.
